Frequently Asked Question

Frequently Asked Question

  • What types of auto insurance coverage does DriveWise Insure offer?

    We offer Comprehensive, Collision, Liability, and several additional coverage options.

  • How can I customize my auto insurance policy?

    You can customize your policy by adjusting deductibles, coverage limits, and adding optional coverages.

  • What is the difference between collision and comprehensive coverage?

    Collision coverage handles damages from accidents with vehicles or objects, while comprehensive covers non-collision incidents like theft or natural disasters.

  • How do I file a claim with DriveWise Insure?

    You can file a claim online, over the phone, or through our mobile app, available 24/7.

  • Can I add roadside assistance to my policy?

    Yes, roadside assistance can be added to any policy for additional protection while on the road.

  • What should I consider when choosing my deductible?

    Consider your financial ability to pay the deductible in case of a claim and how it affects your premium.

  • What does uninsured/underinsured motorist coverage protect against?

    It covers expenses if you're hit by a driver who doesn't have sufficient insurance.

  • Are there discounts available for safe drivers?

    Yes, we offer discounts for safe drivers, including lower premiums for accident-free histories and defensive driving courses.
